snippet: Thousands of people dragged a Pakistani man accused of desecrating the Koran from a police station in central Pakistan, beat him to death and then set his body on fire.
abstract: Thousands of people drag a Pakistani man accused of desecrating the Koran from a police station in central Pakistan, beat him to death and then set his body on fire; episode highlights the highly charged nature of Pakistan’s blasphemy laws, under which anyone found guilty of insulting the Prophet Muhammad or the Koran can be sentenced to death.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of people dragged a Pakistani man accused of desecrating the Koran from a police station in central Pakistan, beat him to death and then set his body on fire.

headline.main: Pakistan: Mob Kills and Burns Man Suspected of Desecrating the Koran
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Mob Kills and Burns Man Suspected of Desecrating the Koran
